subject: Object Graph Diff
msgSnippet: I need to compare two object graphs for my JUnit test. Example: A - B - C Each class has a couple of attributes. A contains B which contains C. I have two
messageBody:
I need to compare two object graphs for my JUnit test.

Example: A -> B -> C

Each class has a couple of attributes.

A contains B which contains C.

I have two instances of A: a1 and a2.

I test all the attributes of the a1 object graph in my test after
the method under test has returned it to me. Then I change a
parameter and call that method again and get the instance a2 as a
result.

Now I expect that only a certain attribute is different between a1
and a2. I don't want to retest all the attributes. So I want to test
just the difference between a1 and a2 object graph.

DiffResult dr = diff(a1, a2);
String[] diffAttrib = dr.getDifferentAttributes();
assertEquals(1, diffAtrib.size());
Object newVal = dr.getNewValueForAttrib(diffAttrib[0]);
assertEquals(2.5, newVal);

Something like that. Does it exist so that I don't need to write a
utility for this?
